abstract: CBS and ABC shared the lead in the ratings on Sunday, with CBS attracting the most total viewers and ABC earning the highest ratings among adults 18 to 49. ABC got a lift in that demographic from a two-hour edition of “Extreme Makeover: Home Edition,” which drew an average of 13.6 million viewers at 8 p.m., according to Nielsen’s estimates.
lead_paragraph: CBS and ABC shared the lead in the ratings on Sunday, with CBS attracting the most total viewers and ABC earning the highest ratings among adults 18 to 49. ABC got a lift in that demographic from a two-hour edition of “Extreme Makeover: Home Edition,” which drew an average of 13.6 million viewers at 8 p.m., according to Nielsen’s estimates.

headline.main: ’60 Minutes’ Keeps Its Lock on Sunday Night
